definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day

sentences.english: Coriolis acceleration is a nodus in general mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 科里奥利加速度在普通物理力学中是一难点。

sentences.english: It is really a nonclassical communication system.
sentences.chinese: 该系统为一非古典通信系统。

sentences.english: Surely applying a thin layer of antifriction when installing sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在装轴套时，在轴上涂上一薄层减摩剂。

sentences.english: Reading is good, but we have to choose what to read.
sentences.chinese: 读书是一好事，但我们必须多加注意书的选择。

sentences.english: Who would have thought a pansy could be such a naughty little flower.
sentences.chinese: 谁曾想到一三色堇可能是这样一个顽皮的花。

sentences.english: Get a book of positive , inspirational thoughts and keep it by your desk or by your pillow. Read one or two passages each day.
sentences.chinese: 桌上或案头摆放着一本励志书，每天都去朗读一两段。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the monohydrate is not mentioned in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 值得指出的是，在本文献中没有提到一水化物。

sentences.english: Thus attacked, the Japanese would be afraid to split up.
sentences.chinese: 一遭到这样的伏击，日军就龟缩作一因。

sentences.english: The three of them plodded up the hill in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 三个人在雪中一步一弯腰地爬山。

sentences.english: In the arms of a suspect was arrested near the burial.
sentences.chinese: 一可疑人物在武器埋藏地附近被逮捕。

sentences.english: In such a case, a lapse of memory will represent directly the un-invoiced services.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，失误的储存表现为“不”一开单服务。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and-One clothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在一加一服装店当店员，负责销售。

sentences.english: Some people see this one, Aphrodite does not play on the air to one.
sentences.chinese: 一看到这几个人，阿芙罗狄忒就气不打一处来。

sentences.english: Legend has it that there was a devil in Dynasty of Dong Han.
sentences.chinese: 相传，在东汉时期有一妖怪为祸人间。

sentences.english: Religions die when they are proved to be true.
sentences.chinese: 疑惑是所有宗学的一全体。

sentences.english: Passengers must check in at the airport one hour before plane leaves.
sentences.chinese: 乘客必须在飞机起飞前一小时到机场签票。

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
